1: <pb/><e>Cybitz aj Israel oc in the jax tuj Jerusal√©n</e> <pb/><t>Tu'nju at nim nbise in chin cubsane twitza Nman.</t>
2: <t>Bintza nyole Nman ex k'ontz twi'ya ti'j oc in chin cubsane twitza.</t>
3: <pb/><t>Nman, nokwit cucx in tzaj tna'na aju kbinchbene mya ba'n, ax toc mi jun jacu cyaj ten minti' til.</t>
4: <t>Pero tuc'ila in cnet najsbil kile, tu'ntzun kxobe twitza ex tu'n knimane teya.</t>
5: <t>Tu'n tcyakil wanmiye in chin ayone ti'j Kman ex k'ukl nc'u'je ti'j tyol.</t>
6: <t>Mas in chin ayone ti'j Kman cywitz ke xk'ukil te konic'an in che ayon ti'j tu'n tjawil k'ij. Ic tza'n in che ayon ke xk'ukil ocxi tjawil k'ij,</t>
7: <t>icxtzun che ayone ti'j Kman, akeye aj Israel, porque cucx in tzaj k'ak'an tc'u'j ki'j ex at colbil tu'n.</t>
8: <t>A clol cye aj Israel tuj tcyakil cyil.</t>
